content: I'll definitely keep those tips in mind. I want to make sure Max stays comfortable and clean, especially with his new bed from Petco. Speaking of which, I got it on sale for $40, which was a great deal considering its original price was $60. I'm really happy with the purchase. Anyway, back to Max's coat care - do you think I should use a humidifier in my home to help with his shedding? I've heard it can help reduce shedding and prevent dry skin.
